Class NamespaceConverter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Function<String,String>

    public class NamespaceConverter
extends InternalIdentifierConverter
    A simple InternalIdentifierConverter that replaces internal JCR namespaces with external namespaces, and replaces the term for content.

    Apr 1, 2014
